first_translate: don’t let that darkness touch you!
follow these knights from this point on.
knights, make sure she stays safe at all costs!

hangle: 영애, 어둠이 다가오는 쪽으로 돌아갈 생각이신가요?
first_translate: my lady, are you going back toward the darkness?

hangle: 본부에 아직 남아 있는 사람이 있을지도 모르니까요.
first_translate: because there might still be people left inside headquarters.
I won’t take long, so don’t worry about me--
something wants to kill you, my lady!
our comrade was trapped inside our base!
thank goodness for your help, ms. magician!

hangle: 어둠과 마수가 몰려와서 꼼짝없이 죽는 줄로만 알았어요!
first_translate: the monsters were closing in on us, and I thought we’d never get out alive!
if you want to thank someone, then go thank mr. gunther over there!
after all, he followed me into danger.

hangle: 그보다, 정말 이제 남은 사람은 없는 거죠?
first_translate: more importantly, are you really the last one remaining?
that’s right! everyone else got out safely!
all we have to do now is head back--
run as fast as you can, gunther!
it feels like a heavy weight is crushing my chest.
and my head hurts too badly.
what am I supposed to do?
could this be what eunice meant by “something”?
your highness, please wait inside where it’s safer.
I'll just step outside for a moment.
excuse me? but why would you--?
